tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Natural Cycle Ivf Treatment,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF),
review: As a couple navigating the challenging journey of infertility, my spouse and I found solace and hope in the compassionate care of Dr. Indrani Madam and the dedicated team at Hegde Hospital. After a 2 miscarriages and 2 unsuccessful IUI cycle & 1 unsuccessful ivf 9 years of infertility elsewhere, we were filled with uncertainty and apprehension. However, from our very first consultation with Dr. Indrani madam , we were struck by her warmth, professionalism, and unwavering commitment to helping us achieve our dream of parenthood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: We are struggling to be parents from long time & got recommendation of this hospital. When we first met dr. Indrani, she was very patient and heard all our concerns and guided us throughout the process. We got the good news in our first attempt itself. All thanks to the doctor and her will to get us through our hard time. She is one of the happy go lucky doc for me and I would love to recommend her. Thank you Dr. Indrani and her team once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you very much to Hegde Hospital and Indrani Mam. We just randomly checked the hospitals but hegde turned out the best in all the parameters. Doctors and admin team are very kind and helpful from the day one. Regular followup and Guidance through the entire process made us confident that we are going to hear the good news and get the happiest moment of our lives. Me and my wife sincerely thank the entire hospital team, especially Indrani ma'am, who supported us in our journey to parenthood.
